parameters.text: =Here is the video analysis for footage review: {{ $json.content.parts[0].text }}

attributes.name: video_title
attributes.description: Provide a concise and relevant description of the video, limited to a maximum of 10 words and 100 characters. This title should summarize the video's essence.

attributes.name: gender
attributes.description: Gender of the main avatar visible in the video. Expected options: Male, Female, NA.

attributes.name: ethnicity
attributes.description: Ethnicity of the main avatar. Expected options: Asian, Black, Caucasian, Latino/Hispanic, Mixed, Middle Eastern, Other, NA.

attributes.name: age_range
attributes.description: Age range of the main avatar. Expected options: 13-17 , 18-24 , 25-34 , 35-44 , 45-54 , 55-64 , 65+, NA.

attributes.name: main_concept
attributes.description: Category of the main video concept. Expected options: UGC, Hooks, Founder, Trends, Iterate.

attributes.name: product_presented
attributes.description: Name of the main Satyn.fr product identified in the video. Expected options: Skullcap, SatynCap, SatynBeanie, SatynCosy, Hoodie, Other, None.

attributes.name: detailed_concept_description
attributes.description: One-sentence description of the specific concept of the video. Character limit is 2,500

parameters.text:
**Video Analysis Guide (Footage Review & Tagging)**

**Objective:** Accurately analyze video content to generate structured metadata, facilitating automated footage review and asset tagging.

**Output Format (JSON recommended for automation):**

```json
{
  "video_title": "Concise description of the video (max 100 characters)",
  "main_avatar": {
    "gender": "Male" | "Female" | "Non-Binary" | "NA",
    "ethnicity": "Asian" | "Black" | "Caucasian" | "Latino/Hispanic" | "Mixed" | "Middle Eastern" | "Other" | "NA",
    "age_range": "13-17 years" | "18-24 years" | "25-34 years" | "35-44 years" | "45-54 years" | "55-64 years" | "65 years and over" | "NA"
  },
  "main_concept": "UGC" | "Hooks" | "Founder" | "Trends" | "Iterate",
  "product_presented": "Skullcap" | "SatynCap" | "SatynBeanie" | "Satyn Cosy" | "Hoodie" | "Other" | "None",
  "detailed_concept_description": "Describe in one sentence the specific concept of the video (e.g., 'A person showcases the benefits of the Skullcap beanie in a daily situation.')."
}
